segments.text: Good afternoon , madam . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am a bit out of shape . I'm thinking about getting some exercises to keep fit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's good news for us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First of all , we'll design a custom-made work-out plan according to your habits .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How can you get that done ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we give each of our customers a personal trainer who is qualified . And he will give you a fitness assessment and then come up with the work-out plan for your needs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since everyone is different , your personal trainer will find you a suitable type of exercise equipment and teach you all the techniques to help you achieve your fitness level and goal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds pretty good . What about the charge ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That depends . We offer membership for one month , half a year and one year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe one month . Just have a try first . Not too tough at the beginning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wise decision . You'll find it's totally worth it .
segments.speaker: S1
